snippet: As he begins his bus tour Friday, Mr. Romney, who has lain low and focused much of his time on fund-raising since winning the Republican nomination, now will likely be forced to wade into an issue that he had steered clear of for most of the...
abstract: As he begins his bus tour Friday, Mr. Romney, who has lain low and focused much of his time on fund-raising since winning the Republican nomination, now will likely be forced to wade into an issue that he had steered clear of for most of the campaign.

byline.original: By SARAH WHEATON and MICHAEL BARBARO

headline.main: Immigration Announcement May Overshadow Romney Bus Tour
